en: Peppa and George are in their bedroom playing with their toys.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在卧室里玩玩具。

en: George, let's play dollies and dinosaurs.
zh: 我们来玩玩偶和恐龙吧。

en: what is that? It looks like a horrible monster!
zh: 这是什么东西呀？看上去像一头恐怖的怪兽！
啊！是一头恐龙！救命啊！救命啊！

en: Daddy Pig is in the sitting room, reading his newspaper.
zh: 猪爸爸坐在客厅里看报纸。

en: Mummy Pig is reading her book.

zh: 佩奇，乔治，发生什么事了？

en: What on earth is going on?
And look at all this mess on the floor!
zh: 你们看看地上怎么这么乱啊？

en: Someone could trip over and hurt themselves.
zh: 一不小心就会被绊倒受伤的。

en: Someone did trip over and hurt themselves!
zh: 确实已经有人绊倒受伤了。

en: Come on, children,let's do a bit of tidying up.
zh: 来吧，孩子们，我们来整理一下房间。

en: But Mummy,we're playing dollies and dinosaurs.
zh: 但是妈妈，我们正在玩玩偶和恐龙呢。

en: You can play again when you've tidied up.
zh: 你们可以整理干净后再玩。
可是这些都是乔治东西弄乱的。

en: So this must be one of George's lovely dresses?
zh: 那这条肯定是乔治的漂亮裙子了？

en: Well, maybe some of the messes is mine.
zh: 好吧，可能有一些是我弄乱的。

en: Right! I'll help George tidy and Mummy Pig can help Peppa.
zh: 好的！我来帮乔治整理妈妈帮佩奇整理。

en: We can have a race. Girls against boys!
zh: 我们来个比赛吧。女生对男生。

en: Good idea! Let's see who can tidy up first.
zh: 好主意！让我们来看看谁先整理完。

en: Teddy! I've been looking for you.
Quick, Peppa! Put Teddy in your toy basket.
zh: 快点，佩奇！把泰迪放进你的玩具篮里。
好啦！现在该整理书了。这样就好了！
没错！是一本恐龙故事书。
这本是乔治的立体（弹起插画）恐龙书。

en: Daddy, George, you've stopped tidying up!
zh: 爸爸，乔治，你们怎么停下来不整理了？

en: Come on, George, put this back on the bookshelf.
zh: 快点，乔治，把书放回书架。

en: Daddy, you're very slow at tidying up.
zh: 爸爸，你们整理得实在太慢了。

en: Mummy and I are going to win.
We all win. Look how tidy the room is.
zh: 我们都赢了。看看房间现在有多干净！

en: Mummy, now that we've tidied our room,
zh: 妈妈，现在我们把房间整理干净了，

en: Can we play dollies and dinosaurs again?
zh: 我们可以再继续玩玩偶和恐龙吗？

en: Yes, you can carry on with your game now.
zh: 当然，你们现在可以继续玩游戏了。

en: Where are my dolls? Where is Mr. Dinosaur?
zh: 我的玩偶呢？你的恐龙先生呢?

en: Oh, dear,The room is untidy again.
Well, at least it was tidy for a bit.
zh: 好吧，至少干净了那么一小会儿。
